channel.title: Wildy to safe spot
channel.description: Hi, im currently having trouble making a wildy a spot safe and i found a tutorial on here but its a shitty one and its leeched, so i was hoping someone here could tell me/ show me an example of how to do it. Thanks

item.title: Wildy to safe spot
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

david7147:

Hi, im currently having trouble making a wildy a spot safe and i found a tutorial on here but its a shitty one and its leeched, so i was hoping someone here could tell me/ show me an example of how to do it. Thanks

Look for isInWilderness until you get some coords, similar to this:

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
		if (Type == 1) {
			if ((coordY >= 3520) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
				return true;
			}
		} else if (Type == 2) {
			if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
				return true;
			}
		}
		return false;
	}

Remove the coordinates.
